428 /* NOT EXPOSED
429  \brief Release all memory that has been allocated by any of the execute functions that involve a DataTransferArray with output elements requesting memory allocation by the execute function.
430 
431  \param script the script object
432 
433  This function does nothing if no memory allocations have been requested.
434  Memory allocations that have not been release are also released when
435  pcr_destroyScript() is called.
436 
437  \returns
438  - -1 bad \a script pointer
439  - 0 no error
